title: A fresh look at an Ancient Greek classic
itunes:title: A fresh look at an Ancient Greek classic
itunes:subtitle: Tom Holland tells us about his new translation of Herodotus, the father of history. Plus Ben Wilson and Margaret MacMillan reveal their favourite history books
description:
